short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a new tab and see a full browser photo pulled from a RSS Feed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you open a new tab in Chrome, Porthole will fill the browser with a photo selected from various popular RSS feeds covering Design, Architecture, Art and Technology.

Through the settings, you can create your own custom feed including the sources that you like.
